caption.p: Mean projected range size of 34 alien garden plants (circles) and of their 173 congeners in the native and naturalized flora of Europe (triangles) under current climate ( BASE) and under three different scenarios of climate change ( RCP2.6, RCP4.5, RCP8.5) for the second half of the 21st century (2050â€“2100). The error bars indicate the standard deviation
